CorrectPackagingRule - Class in se.jguru.nazgul.tools.codestyle.enforcer.rules
Enforcer rule to enforce correct packaging for all source files within a project, implying that all source files should be located within or under a package identical to the groupId of the project itself.
CorrectPackagingRule() - Constructor for class se.jguru.nazgul.tools.codestyle.enforcer.rules.CorrectPackagingRule
Default constructor, assigning the DEFAULT_PACKAGE_EXTRACTORS for use as all known PackageExtractor instances.
